entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Leaf Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
